job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description:
Job Description
The machine learning engineer position within the Client Platform Engineering (CPE) organization is chartered to develop/apply machine learning algorithms to effectively solve real-life engineering problems and improve design tools and methodologies in our platforms.
Depending on the candidate's background, the responsibilities and job scope may involve the following:
Utilize data mining techniques to analyze and derive insights from user telemetry data, system power/performance monitoring data
Develop/apply machine learning algorithms such as reinforcement learning, Bayesian algorithms, deep learning in design optimization applications
Develop expert system to work together with machine learning algorithms and deliver solutions for end-to-end tools and methodologies
Support cloud computing infrastructure prototyping and development
Complete programming, testing, debugging, documentation, and deployment of the solution
Interacts with users/design teams to define product/solution requirements and technology decomposition
Additional Requirements Include
Passionate about applied machine learning and deep learning to solve real-life engineering problems
Extensive knowledge/experience of Machine learning, Data science, Heuristic algorithms, Optimization algorithms
Familiar with state-of-art machine learning, deep learning algorithms and development
Proficient in C, C++, python, Matlab, Java
Excellent problem solving, critical thinking and communication skills
Understanding of computer architecture, physics-based simulation methods
Minimum Qualifications
Qualifications
Masters Degree or higher in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering OR similar technical STEM degree.
4+ years of experience with Machine learning, Data science, Heuristic algorithms, Optimization algorithms .
5+ years of experience with C, C++, python, Matlab, Java
Preferred Qualifications
PHD
Inside this Business Group
The Client Computing Group (CCG) is responsible for driving business strategy and product development for Intel's PC products and platforms, spanning form factors such as notebooks, desktops, 2 in 1s, all in ones. Working with our partners across the industry, we intend to continue to advance PC experiences to deliver the real-world performance people demand. As the largest business unit at Intel, CCG is investing more heavily in the PC, ramping its capabilities even more aggressively, and designing the PC experience even more deliberately, including delivering a predictable cadence of leadership products. As a result, we are able to fuel innovation across Intel, providing an important source of IP and scale, as well as help the company deliver on its purpose of enriching the lives of every person on earth.
Posting Statement
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, religious creed, sex, national origin, ancestry, age, physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, military and veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender, gender expression, gender identity, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by local law, regulation, or ordinance.
